languages.text: "Никогда не видел подобных кораблей. И никогда не видел таких технологий. Мы выловили из пустоты один из сравнительно целых обломков и отправили машиновидцам. И, на всякий случай, изолировали тот отсек, в котором проводятся литургии постижения трофея".

"I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."
languages.original_text: "Никогда не видел подобных кораблей. И никогда не видел таких технологий. Мы выловили из пустоты один из сравнительно целых обломков и отправили машиновидцам. И, на всякий случай, изолировали тот отсек, в котором проводятся литургии постижения трофея".

traits.locale_text: "I have never seen ships like these, never seen these technologies either. We fished one of the relatively intact wreckages out of the void and send it to enginseers. And, just in case, we isolated the section where trophy comprehension liturgies are conducted."

"I have never seen ships like these, never seen these technologies either. We fished one of the relatively intact wreckages out of the void and send it to enginseers. And, just in case, we isolated the section where trophy comprehension liturgies are conducted."

"I have never seen ships like these, never seen these technologies either. We fished one of the relatively intact wreckages out of the void and sent it to our enginseers. And, just in case, we isolated the section where trophy comprehension liturgies are conducted."

"I have never seen ships like these, never seen these technologies either. We fished one of the relatively intact wreckages out of the void and sent it to our enginseers. And, just in case, we isolated the section where trophy comprehension liturgies are conducted."

"I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."

languages.text: “我以前从来没见过这样的船，也没见过这样的技术。我们从虚空之中回收了一部分相对完整的残骸作为战利品，送到了技术人员手中。而且，为了以防万一，我们对残骸的研究区域进行了隔离。”
languages.original_text: "I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."

traits.locale_text: “我以前从来没见过这样的船，也没见过这样的技术。我们从虚空之中回收了一部分相对完整的残骸作为战利品，送到了技术人员手中。而且，为了以防万一，我们对残骸的研究区域进行了隔离。”

languages.text: « Je n'avais encore jamais vu de tels vaisseaux ni une telle technologie. Nous avons récupéré un trophée dans le vide, un morceau d'épave relativement épargné, et nous l'avons confié à nos technaugures. Par mesure de précaution, nous avons également isolé le compartiment dans lequel ils procèdent à leurs liturgies de compréhension. »
languages.original_text: "I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'avais encore jamais vu de tels vaisseaux ni une telle technologie. Nous avons récupéré un trophée dans le vide, un morceau d'épave relativement épargné, et nous l'avons confié à nos technaugures. Par mesure de précaution, nous avons également isolé le compartiment dans lequel ils procèdent à leurs liturgies de compréhension. »

languages.text: "Solche Schiffe habe ich noch nie gesehen und auch solche Technologien nicht. Wir zogen eine Trophäe aus der Leere, ein relativ intakt aussehendes Wrackteil, und brachten es unseren Maschinensehern. Und vorsichtshalber haben wir das Modul isoliert, indem sie ihre Verständnisliturgien durchführen."
languages.original_text: "I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."

traits.locale_text: "Solche Schiffe habe ich noch nie gesehen und auch solche Technologien nicht. Wir zogen eine Trophäe aus der Leere, ein relativ intakt aussehendes Wrackteil, und brachten es unseren Maschinensehern. Und vorsichtshalber haben wir das Modul isoliert, indem sie ihre Verständnisliturgien durchführen."

languages.text: «Nunca he visto naves como esas, ni reconozco su tecnología. Hemos pescado un verdadero trofeo en el vacío y lo hemos enviado a nuestros visioingenieros. Por si las moscas, hemos aislado el compartimento donde celebran las liturgias de comprensión».
languages.original_text: "I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he visto naves como esas, ni reconozco su tecnología. Hemos pescado un verdadero trofeo en el vacío y lo hemos enviado a nuestros visioingenieros. Por si las moscas, hemos aislado el compartimento donde celebran las liturgias de comprensión».

languages.text: 「そのような船は見たことがないし、そのような技術も見たことがないです。我々は虚空から比較的損傷の少ない残骸の一部を引き揚げ、機関整備師に送りました。念のため、彼らが理解の儀式を行っている区画も隔離してあります」
languages.original_text: "I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."

traits.locale_text: 「そのような船は見たことがないし、そのような技術も見たことがないです。我々は虚空から比較的損傷の少ない残骸の一部を引き揚げ、機関整備師に送りました。念のため、彼らが理解の儀式を行っている区画も隔離してあります」

languages.text: "Hayatımda ne böyle gemi ne de böyle teknoloji gördüm. Uçsuzdan bir ganimet çıkardık, gemi enkazından kalma sağlam bir parça. Bu parçayı Mühedyumlarımıza gönderdik. İdrak ayinlerini gerçekleştirdikleri kompartımanı da önlem olarak tecrit ettik."
languages.original_text: "I have never seen ships like that, never seen such technologies either. We've fished a trophy out of the void, a relatively intact fragment of a wreck, and sent it to our Enginseers. And, just in case, we've isolated the compartment where they are performing their comprehension liturgies."
